name: Burg_171
culture_notes: Diet heavy on smoked/pressed river fish
Funerary boat rites and tide-timed festivals
constraints: Rituals consume scarce imported reagents or local labor
No instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: Tech baseline: near-medieval to early-industrial; navigational auguries augment but do not replace charts
Outpost reliant on seasonal trade and single main landing
